remarks: The difference of two complex numbers is zero iff they are equal. Deduction form of ~ subeq0 .  Generalization of ~ subeq0d . (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
negidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
pncand.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
subeq0ad $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A - B ) = 0 <-> A = B ) ) $.
